Method Detail

getIsFileSizeFilter

public static final java.io.FileFilter getIsFileSizeFilter(long fileSize)
getIsFileSizeFilter returns a FileFilter object used to include File objects equal to the specified size;
Parameters:
fileSize - is a long value indicating the only size the File object can be to be accepted by this filter.
Returns:
a Ljava.io.FileFilter object excluding File objects that are not equal to the file size specified.

getMaxFileSizeFilter

public static final java.io.FileFilter getMaxFileSizeFilter(long maxFileSize)
getMaxFileSizeFilter returns a FileFilter object used to include File objects smaller than the specified size;
Parameters:
maxFileSize - is a long value indicating the maximum size the File object can be to be accepted by this filter.
Returns:
a Ljava.io.FileFilter object excluding File objects larger than the specified maximum file size.

getMinFileSizeFilter

public static final java.io.FileFilter getMinFileSizeFilter(long minFileSize)
getMinFileSizeFilter returns a FileFilter object used to include File objects larger than the specified size;
Parameters:
minFileSize - is a long value indicating the minimum size the File object must be to be accepted by this filter.
Returns:
a Ljava.io.FileFilter object excluding File objects smaller than the specified minimum file size.
